titles.title: Be Still And Know That I Am God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be still and know that I am God.
Be still and know that I am God.
The earth revolves around the sun
Be still and know that I am God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be still and know that I am God (2x)
The stars are shining in the heavens
Be still and know that I am God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Be still and know that I am God (2x)
The moon is passing so the sun can shine
Be still and know that I am God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hold to His hand, God's unchanging hand (2x)
Build your hopes on things eternal
Hold to God's unchanging hand.
